--- Bjorn Hansen <bhansen@...> wrote:
> They're still around, working for Blizzard, which
> means no time for working 
> on gladiator.  At least Blizzard makes sweet games
> too :p

Oh, I see. When did they start? Maybe we can spend a
lot of time looking for Gladiator influence in Diablo
II and Warcraft III? I have Warcraft III, but I didn't
notice any Gladiator influence there.

I'm going to be attending University of California
Irvine, so if I'm lucky enough to get an internship at
Blizzard (which is also based in Irvine), maybe I can
go look for them...
